title: TAM-Based Instructional Design for AI Adoption in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital technology skills and secondary-level or higher mathematics knowledge
context.additional_context: Professionals in Medical, Legal, and Technical Fields Learn to Utilize AI Tools in Mathematics Curriculum, Participating Flexibly via Personal Devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core elements of the Technology Acceptance Model (TAM): perceived usefulness, ease of use, attitude, and behavioral intention.
Learners can present at least three criteria for evaluating the usefulness of AI tools in mathematical problem-solving processes.
Learners can write a report analyzing peer groups' attitudes toward AI acceptance using TAM-based surveys.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
